introduction.section1: Among the countless islands of Indonesia, Bali is the most famous. Located in the Southeast Islands, between Java and Lombok, it is part of a group of islands called the Lesser Sunda Islands (or simply the archipelago of the South Islands).
introduction.section2: During the day, enjoy and rest on the immense beaches, or admire the landscapes in front of you, with rice terraces and impressive volcanoes. At night, Bali transforms into a party island, with its bars open all night long. Day and night, Bali is a crazy island.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Bali
meta-description: Discover Bali, the crazy island, from beaches to tropical forests, rice fields to volcanoes by day, and bars open all night long. For each place, we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
